Key Match Events: Luka Doncic finished the game with 32 points, while Dereck Lively II, Kyrie Irving, and Daniel Gafford all notched double-figures in support.
The Mavericks outscored the Magic 46-20 over the final 15 minutes of the first half.
The Mavericks outscored the Magic 52-36 near the rim and brought down 53 rebounds.
Daniel Gafford finished with eight rebounds.
Post-Match Reflections: Magic coach Jamahl Mosley expressed his disappointment over Paolo Banchero's injury and its impact on the team.
Franz Wagner paced the Magic offense with 13 points, but the team struggled with three-point shooting, finishing 8-for-41 (19.5%).
